bibl.title: God's Seal-Bearers, Lector-Priests and Choachytes: Who's Who at Memphis and Hawara. Avec résumés en français et en anglais.
Actes du IXe congrès international des études démotiques. Paris, 31 août - 3 septembre 2005
bibl.author: CANNATA, Maria

bibl.note: Lector-Priests, Choachytes, Pastophoroi and God's Seal-Bearers. - The Textual Sources. - God's Seal-Bearers as Lector-Priests. - God's Seal-Bearers as Choachytes. - God's Seal-Bearers as Lector-Priests and Choachytes. - Problematic Texts. - Conclusion.
